column4: Hello, is it possible to completely get rid of ubuntu on a computer without reinstalling Windows 7 in a dual boot configuration?
Um,i have 3 partitions, i'm no genius with computers, but i have a 100mb system reserved partition, and a windows 7 and linux partition, i installed ubuntu from the live cd
Yes, okay, but i don't have the windows 7 cd anymore, do i need it?
Didn't you make a backup copy of Win7 CDROM
